author: Gamers Nexus
description:
Sponsor: Montech HS01 Pro on Amazon https://geni.us/UYLeZn and HS02 Pro https://geni.us/ABM9fEB
In this hardware news recap for the week, we talk about the Amazon AWS internet outage, RAM prices skyrocketing partly due to AI demand from companies like OpenAI, Intel's B580 price drop, and more. Coverage includes Frore's LiquidJet cooling solution, Lenovo's 9070 XT video card designs, chip tariffs, and potential AMD utilization of Intel's fabs.

The best way to support our work is through our store: https://store.gamersnexus.net/

Like our content? Please consider becoming our Patron to support us: http://www.patreon.com/gamersnexus

Sources document: https://www.one-tab.com/page/1jW-Vu4gTHW8Dbey_Vxf3Q

TIMESTAMPS

00:00 - Recap for the Week
01:28 - Consumer RAM Price Skyrockets
07:06 - Amazon AWS Takes Out the Internet
09:24 - Intel CPU Price Hike
13:59 - Intel B580 GPU Price Drops
15:23 - Lenovo Making 9070 XT GPUs
17:25 - Frore's LiquidJet
19:52 - US Chip Tariffs Again, Again
25:57 -
title: HW News - RIP Internet, RAM Prices Skyrocket from AI Demand, Intel B580 Price Drops
